title: fifth_chapter_start
body:
Some strange undead roar in Meviah
My soldiers could not take care of it
Can you have a look at it?(boss fight)
[[stop]]

title: big_bang
body:
What are you?! Shit he sees me
[[stop]]

title: boss_killed
body:
What was that thing?
I don't know but the undead are getting stronger
That is bad
We must go for Mayor
We need his help
[[stop]]
